author: Clarence Walker
title: Dry and Cool Weekend Forecast for Maryland Weather: Spot Shower Friday
text:
Maryland Weather: Spot shower Friday then wonderful weekend!
Maryland Weather: Spot shower Friday then wonderful weekend!
After a tough stretch of weather, Baltimore is in for a nice and quiet stretch of weather. Friday may see a spot shower, but the weekend is expected to be dry and cool, with a mix of sunshine and clouds. The evening will be nice, dry, and comfortable, with seasonably chilly weather overnight.
Weekend Forecast
Both Saturday and Sunday are expected to have highs in the upper 40s to near 50, with gusty winds on Saturday making temperatures feel like the 30s. Despite the chilly weather, the weekend is set to end 2023 in style with pleasant conditions for outdoor activities.
QUIET NIGHT AHEAD: These low temperatures are typically where our average highs should be, so I hesitate to use the word cold. It’s a chill in the air, but nothing we can’t handle. The night looks dry with partial clearing. Easy start to our Friday! @WJZ pic.twitter.com/PYHvUtf5k9
— Steven Sosna (@SteveSosnaWX) December 28, 2023

author: Tristan Jurkovich
title: Things Grounded 2 Does Better Than The First Game
text:
Summary
- UI improvements in Grounded 2 include a cleaner look and the option to switch between first-person and third-person modes.
- The game's design is more vibrant and detailed in Grounded 2, making the map easier to understand and enhancing the Ranger Outposts.
- The Omni-Tool in Grounded 2 streamlines gameplay with versatile functions, while gear customization options allow players to stand out.
Obsidian Entertainment has been one of the biggest RPG developers in the industry since their big hit, Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic 2: The Sith Lords, in 2004. RPGs quickly became their bread and butter with minimal deviation. Then the pandemic hit, and everyone was stuck inside in 2020, so in July of that year, they released an Early Access version of one of their most ambitious and strange games yet, Grounded.
Related
7 Things to Do First in Grounded 2
The sheer amount of things to do in Grounded 2 can get overwhelming for players, resulting in confusion about what needs to be done first.
Thanks to player feedback, Obsidian Entertainment released Grounded in its full version in 2022 and also launched iton more than Xbox platforms. Now, Grounded 2 is here, and already, there are numerous notable improvements from the first game. That doesn’t mean it’s perfect yet, but these are some of the greatest changes made so far.
7 The UI
A Cleaner Look
The first game had a UI design that was reminiscent of Minecraft. Players could pick up things like candy bars or rocks, and then they would appear at the bottom of the screen in the player’s inventory. It was not a bad UI system for a game with crafting, but the design in Grounded 2 is much cleaner.
For console players, it can still be rough navigating between all the shortcut menus, from crafting furniture to gear to equipping weapons in Grounded 2. That comes with the territory, though, as there are so many mechanics to keep track of. Overall, every menu looks much better in Grounded 2, and a lot of it has been conveniently streamlined to make the experience smoother.
6 Third-Person Appears
Switch Anytime
Obsidian Entertainment seemingly unlocked the key to making third-person games this year. Both The Outer Worlds and Grounded are only playable in first-person, but their two sequels are getting third-person support. It’s great to see the faces of the kid heroes in Grounded 2 as players explore now, but there is a caveat to that.
Related
How to Build Bases in Grounded 2
Here's how players can build their base in Grounded 2 to place all their resources, loot, and machinery, like a workbench, in a safe location.
It’s still easier to fight and pick up items in first-person, which is true of most RPGs that are built primarily with first-person in mind. Still, it’s great that players can go into the menu and switch to third-person anytime they want.
5 The Design
Less Dark, More Vibrant
Going back to the current version of Grounded after playing Grounded 2 is a bit astounding. The game launched out of Early Access in 2022, and yet somehow, three years later, Obsidian Entertainment has improved its tech so much.
Side by side, there is a significant difference graphically as everything is more colorful and vibrant in the sequel. The garden in the first game, while large, is darker and a bit more drab. Even though the backyard is still a scary place filled with bugs, it is a more inviting place to jump into in Grounded 2.
4 The Map
Terrain That Is Easier To Understand
The map has also been improved in Grounded 2 thanks to the UI and graphics upgrade. In the first game, it was hard to tell where anything was while exploring. The map in Grounded 2 has more detail, allowing players to connect what they see in the world with what they see on the map.
There’s still a lot of guesswork for some of the exploration options, as it isn’t as detailed as something recent like Donkey Kong Country Bananza, which took map-making to a whole new level. That said, Grounded 2’s map is still an improvement over its predecessor, without a doubt.
3 The Ranger Outpost
Fallout Says Hello
Another design detail that has improved is the Ranger Outposts that players can find for respite. Players will begin in a massive tower that overlooks the backyard, and they won’t find anything quite that large or unique again. However, the Ranger Outposts are now more detailed and feel like little mini Vaults from the Fallout series.
Since Obsidian Entertainment worked on Fallout: New Vegas, it’s easy to see how they came up with the Ranger Outposts designs this time around. In the original, these shelters were very basic, like the first one players encounter in Grounded, which was no better than a gazebo with some computers in it. In Gounded 2, they feel far move lived-in and a part of the world.
2 The Omni-Tool
A Tool For Every Occasion
In the first game, one of the first things Grounded wants players to craft is a stone axe to start cutting down plants, such as trees. In the sequel, players are given the Omni-Tool almost immediately in Grounded 2. This handy tool can chop things down infinitely and be upgraded to do other things, like repair items or dig holes.
Related
How to Cook in Grounded 2
Food in Grounded 2 needs to be cooked to make it safe to eat; here's how to cook raw food to make it safe to eat.
The Omni-Tool can be upgraded to increase its strength and can then cut through bigger materials. While players still have to craft a lot of gear, like weapons and armor, in Grounded 2, it is great to have a set of other tools they don’t have to think about crafting all contained in one handy-dandy unit.
1 Gear Makes Your Characters Pop
Customize To Your Liking
Unfortunately, there are no typical RPG character customization options when players choose their kids at the beginning of Grounded 2. Players can at least craft a wide range of armor and weapons to make their chosen character stand out more.
Overall, the designs of the gear have been improved and feature a lot more detail than in the original game. It can still look awkward to wear leaves and bug carcasses as armor, but Monster Hunter fans have gotten used to this type of gear crafting for decades now. In Grounded 2, players will likely be happy with what they have.
Grounded 2
- Released
- 2025-07
- ESRB
- Teen / Violence, Blood
- Developer(s)
-
Obsidian Entertainment - Publisher(s)
- Xbox Game Studios
- Engine
- Unreal Engine 5

title: Cloud Services Fueling Growth In The Software Defined
text:
Cloud Services Fueling Growth In The Software Defined Networking Market Driving Market Acceleration in the Software Defined Networking Industry, 2025 07-31-2025 06:26 AM CET | IT, New Media & Software
Press release from: The Business Research Company Software Defined Networking Market
Use code ONLINE30 to get 30% off on global market reports and stay ahead of tariff changes, macro trends, and global economic shifts
How Large Will the Software Defined Networking Market Size By 2025?
In recent times, the software-defined networking market scale has seen considerable expansion. The market is set to surge from a value of $32.51 billion in 2024 to $39.39 billion in 2025, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) hitting 21.2%. This growth in the preceding period is primarily due to the rising demand for centralized network management, the increasing necessity for straightforward network management, the emergence of network virtualization technologies, the escalating acceptance of virtualization technologies, and the surge in security risks and attack threats.
How Big Is the Software Defined Networking Market Size Expected to Grow by 2029?
The software defined networking market is projected to experience massive expansion in the upcoming years, escalating to a value of $84.86 billion by 2029, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 21.2%. The surge during the prediction period is primarily due to the escalating demand for network automation, desire for effective network security solutions, need for network programming, expansion of cloud computing, and heightened focus on network analytics. Anticipated trends within the forecast period encompass the incorporation of artificial intelligence (AI) in networking, development of network automation abilities, strategic partnerships, technological advancements, and the proliferation of software-defined networking within the telecommunications sector.
View the full report here:
https://www.thebusinessresearchcompany.com/report/software-defined-networking-global-market-report
Which Key Market Drivers Powering Software Defined Networking Market Expansion and Growth?
The surge in cloud services demand is slated to bolster the expansion of the software defined networking market in the future. Cloud services, offering a broad spectrum of accessible and on-demand computing resources and applications over the Internet, are propelling this demand. The necessity for adjustable, affordable, and accessible computing resources, facilitating efficient management of data, applications, and IT infrastructure, drives cloud services demand. The incorporation of cloud services in software-defined networking boosts network adaptability and scalability, permits dynamic resource allocation, centralized control, and effective service delivery. For example, Eurostat, a government organization based in Luxembourg, reported in December 2023 that cloud computing services were adopted by 45.2% of businesses in the European Union in 2023, an uptick of 4.2% from 2021. The adoption rate was significantly higher among large-scale enterprises, with 77.6% revealing acquisitions, marking a 6% escalation compared to 2021. Thus, the intensified demand for cloud services is fueling the expansion of the software defined networking market.
Get your free sample here:
https://www.thebusinessresearchcompany.com/sample.aspx?id=14501&type=smp
Which Fast-Growing Trends Are Poised to Disrupt the Software Defined Networking Market?
The key players in the software defined networking market are focusing on the creation of innovative technologies like cloud-native SDN (Software-Defined Networking) controllers to secure a competitive advantage. A cloud-native SDN (Software-Defined Networking) controller, significantly designed to operate within cloud-native surroundings, is a networking control plane. For instance, the France-based standardization institute, the European Telecommunications Standards Institute, declared the second release of TeraFlowSDN, a ground-breaking full-featured software-defined cloud-native SDN robust orchestrator and controller specifically designed for transport networks, in February 2023. This open-source, micro-service-based, and carrier-grade cloud-native SDN controller integrates with different network components and adds advanced features for network management and orchestration. Thus, TeraFlowSDN becomes a significant addition to the SDN field.
What Are the Emerging Segments in the Software Defined Networking Market?
The software defined networking market covered in this report is segmented -
1) By Type: Open Software Defined Networking, Software Defined Networking Via Application Programming Interfaces (API), Software Defined Networking Via Overlay
2) By Component: Solution, Service
3) By Organization Size: Small And Medium Enterprises (SMEs), Large Enterprises
4) By Application: Banking, Financial Services And Insurance (BFSI), Information Technology Enabled Services (ITeS), Education, Retail, Manufacturing, Government And Defense, Healthcare, Other Applications
Subsegments:
1) By Open Software Defined Networking: OpenFlow-based SDN, Open-source SDN Solutions
2) By Software Defined Networking Via Application Programming Interfaces (API): API-based Network Controllers, Network Management and Automation Tools via API
3) By Software Defined Networking Via Overlay: Network Function Virtualization (NFV) Overlays, Virtual LAN (VLAN) and Virtual Private Networks (VPN) Overlays

Which are the Top Profitable Regional Markets for the Software Defined Networking Industry?
North America was the largest region in the software defined networking market in 2024. Asia-Pacific is expected to be the fastest-growing region in the forecast period. The regions covered in the software defined networking market report are Asia-Pacific, Western Europe, Eastern Europe, North America, South America, Middle East, Africa.

author: esportenewsmundo
title: Liverpool toma susto, mas vira sobre Leicester e aumenta sua vantagem na liderança
text:
Liverpool toma susto, mas vira sobre Leicester e aumenta sua vantagem na liderança
Os Reds abriram sete pontos sobre o Chelsea
Com outra grande atuação, o Liverpool venceu o Leicester de virada, por 3 a 1, e garantiu a liderança isolada da Premier League. Jordan Ayew abriu o placar para os Foxes no começo da etapa inicial. Pouco antes do intervalo, Gakpo marcou um golaço e deixou tudo igual. No segundo tempo, Curtis Jones e Salah viraram.
Confira como foi a vitória dos Reds abaixo:
Primeiro tempo
Jogando em casa e com o apoio de sua torcida, o Liverpool começou melhor a partida e passou perto de abrir o placar. Salah foi lançado e obrigou Stolarczyk a fazer grande defesa. Por outro lado, o Leicester abriu o placar em uma de suas primeiras chegadas. Aos cinco, Mavididi recebeu rasteiro pelo lado esquerdo e cruzou para Ayew, que se antecipou a Robertson e bateu rasteiro no canto para abrir o placar: 1 a 0 Leicester.
Após sair atrás do marcador, os Reds rondavam a área dos Foxes, mas não conseguiam levar muito perigo e pararam na boa marcação dos comandados de Ruud Van Nistelrooy. Em sua melhor oportunidade, Robertson acertou a trave após seu cruzamento ir na direção da meta.
A equipe de Arne Slot seguiu pressionando e chegou perto de empatar. Em um contra-ataque, a bola chegou a Salah, que bateu cruzado no travessão. A pressão surtiu efeito e os Reds empataram na sequência com um golaço. Aos 45′, Gakpo recebeu no lado esquerdo, invadiu a entrada da área e bateu bonito para deixar tudo igual em Anfield: 1 a 1.
Segundo tempo
O líder da Premier League continuou pressionando na volta para a segunda etapa e, logo na sequência, virou a partida. Aos três, Mac Allister recebeu na área pelo lado direito e cruzou para Curtis Jones empurrar para o fundo das redes e virar a partida: 2 a 1 Liverpool.
Após virar o jogo, o Leicester chegou perto de empatar em uma rara escapada. Daka recebeu um cruzamento na área, mas errou o tempo de bola e não conseguiu concluir. Por outro lado, Stolarczyk voltou a aparecer na partida e fez uma defesa importante para parar a conclusão de Darwin Núñez.
Os comandados de Arne Slot chegaram a marcar o terceiro, mas o gol foi anulado em um lance milimétrico. Gakpo aproveitou a sobra da defesa e marcou o terceiro, mas a arbitragem marcou impedimento de Nuñez e a decisão foi confirmada pelo VAR.
O Liverpool seguia pressionando e o terceiro parecia questão de tempo. Salah parou em outra grande defesa de Stolarczyk após bater de bico na área. Isso não fez muita falta e, na sequência, o egípcio ampliou. Aos 36′, o camisa 11 foi lançado pelo lado direito, cortou a marcação e bateu no canto direito para o fundo das redes: 3 a 1 Liverpool.
Após marcar o terceiro, os Reds apenas tocaram a bola no campo de ataque e administraram sua vantagem. Ao som de sua torcida, a equipe de Arne Slot rondou a área do Leicester e esperou pelo apito final.
Com o resultado, o Liverpool chega a 42 pontos na Premier League, tendo sete de vantagem sobre o vice-líder Chelsea. Por outro lado, a derrota faz o Leicester voltar à zona de rebaixamento e ficar com 12 pontos.

title: Sarasota celebrates Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day despite the weather
text: NEWSDr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day marked by MLK Music Fest in SarasotaAttendees of the MLK Music Fest celebrated and danced at Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial Park following the Unity Walk in Sarasota on Monday, January 15.
